gen:link.msg:message: e7493_e: ldr_v0082: In T 06.01, no empty value in the cell (c0040, c0070, c0090, c0120, c0140, c0160, c0200) --> [T 06.01 (All rows)] if ({{c0010}} != empty and {{c0020}} != empty) then ({{c0040}} != empty and {{c0070}} != empty and {{c0090}} != empty and {{c0120}} != empty and {{c0140}} != empty and {{c0160}} != empty and {{c0200}} != empty) FAILS because if ((not(empty(xfi:fact-typed-dimension-value($a, QName('http://www.eba.europa.eu/xbrl/crr/dict/dim', 'IDQ'))/*[1]) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'a'))) and not(empty($b) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'b'))))) then ((not(empty($c) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'c'))) and not(empty($d) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'd'))) and not(empty($e) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'e'))) and not(empty($f) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'f'))) and not(empty($g) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'g'))) and not(empty($h) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'h'))) and not(empty($i) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'i'))))) else (true()) is not true

e7493_e: [T 06.01 (All rows)] if ({{c0010}} != empty and {{c0020}} != empty) then ({{c0040}} != empty and {{c0070}} != empty and {{c0090}} != empty and {{c0120}} != empty and {{c0140}} != empty and {{c0160}} != empty and {{c0200}} != empty) FAILS because if ((not(empty(xfi:fact-typed-dimension-value($a, QName('http://www.eba.europa.eu/xbrl/crr/dict/dim', 'IDQ'))/*[1]) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'a'))) and not(empty($b) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'b'))))) then ((not(empty($c) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'c'))) and not(empty($d) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'd'))) and not(empty($e) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'e'))) and not(empty($f) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'f'))) and not(empty($g) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'g'))) and not(empty($h) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'h'))) and not(empty($i) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'i'))))) else (true()) is not true
